fishes.name: Rockfish
fishes.description: The solid one. Acts as a collider.

fishes.name: Pufferfish
fishes.description: The spiky one. Explodes upon contact.

fishes.name: Glassfish
fishes.description: The random one. Deflects bubble at random angle.

fishes.name: Swordfish
fishes.description: The pointy one. Destroys ball when hit from front.

fishes.name: Cuttlefish
fishes.description: The hidden one. Camouflage surrounding fishes when hit for 2 shots.

fishes.name: Coral
fishes.description: The protective one. Provides a shield for surrounding fishes for 2 shots.

fishes.name: ZebraFish
fishes.description: The unusual one. Move 2 steps forward if no adjacent fishes were hit
